name: Fungus Time
description:
This game is inspired by rogue likes, especially binding of isaac and All that rain promises and more.

Feel free to play around with the included source code!

Game controls

Arrow keysMoveZJumpXShootDown arrow + ZFall down from ledge

Leveleditor

Left clickPlace a tileRight clickRemove tileALT + Left clickPick a tile/platform from mapZ Switch between tile and platform modeXToggle platformsV Toggle transparent platformsLeft arrow keyPrevious roomRight arrow keyNext RoomN New RoomSSave current room
  • Art, story and programming: Thor Merlin Lervik
  • Narration voice: Aslak Hauglid
  • Music: DST

2014
